heading: Schools. Prayers.
general-note: Here are entered works containing collections of prayers for use in schools. Works on the inclusion of prayers or a period of silent prayer or meditation in the daily schedule of public schools are entered under. Prayer in the public schools.. Works on the teaching of religion and/or the presentation of religious programs in the public schools as well as the exercise of freedom of religion by students and school employees are entered under. Religion in the public schools..
